job.title: Senior Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: ltstronggtposition purposeltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtworking at the worlds largest home improvement retailer is a careerdefining experience new associates decide to join us because they love our people and culture they get to work with cuttingedge technologies and they spend every day solving largescale problems that matter as a home depot quotecenter associate you will impact the daily lives and decisions of our customers who spend billions of dollars at our stores in north americaltbrgtltbrgtat the home depot quotecenter our mission is to enable a frictionless customer experience to sell pros the complete job for the planned purchase behind everything our users see and experience within the home depot quotecenter application ecosystem is the build integrate and connect operating model built and managed by a diverse team of merchants product managers engineers marketeers operations and support professionals that enable doers to get more doneltbrgtltbrgtwere committed to maintaining a fun engaging and inclusive environment ensuring the agility of a closeknit team and driving results that enable home depot to continue to be a leader in our industry at the home depot quotecenter we value diversity in all of its forms and we work hard to support growing associate skills in a fastpaced collaborative environmentltbrgtltbrgtthe home depot quotecenter technology team is focused on radically reimagining the shopping experience at home depot utilizing the latest web technologies and data toolsltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtas a senior cloud engineer you will be responsible for building and supporting the platform and application infrastructure of one of the fastest growing aspects of the home depot this will require you to maintain high site uptimeavailability while embracing rapid change and growth using a strong devops mindset of continuous delivery and site automation this role requires deep technical knowledge adaptability hands on execution and a ruthless drive towards higher levels of availability and resiliency in this role you willltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligtdesign and deliver on the next version of our platformltligtltligtengineer application infrastructure that is reliable efficient and maintainableltligtltligtset the standard for infrastructural engineering excellenceltligtltligtpartner closely with software engineering teams using a strong devops mindsetltligtltligtconstantly improve operational processes and efficiencyltligtltligthave a maniacal focus on site uptimeltligtltligtautomate automate automateltbrgtltligtltulgta senior software engineer is a seasoned software engineer activities include designing developing installing and maintaining software solutions senior level software engineers will be expected to mentor less experienced members of their team prepare to become a lead if the opportunity presents itself be selfdirected and able to lead a small project team in addition senior software engineers should maintain technical depth being very skilled in certain parts of the technology stack and breadth not isolated to a single segment of the technology stackltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtmajor tasks responsibilities and key accountabilitiesltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggt writing new code and test casesltbrgtltbrgt helping with solution design and architectureltbrgtltbrgt debugging existing codeltbrgtltbrgt learning new skillsltbrgtltbrgt mentoringltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtnature and scopeltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtthis position reports to the manager information systemsltbrgtltbrgtthis position has no direct reportsltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtenvironmentltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtltstronggtenvironmental job requirementsltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtlocated in a comfortable indoor area any unpleasant conditions would be infrequent and not objectionableltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugttravelltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggttypically requires overnight travel less than of the timeltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtminimum qualificationsltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtltstronggtadditional environmental job requirements ltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtmust be eighteen years of age or olderltbrgtltbrgtmust be legally permitted to work in the united statesltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugteducation requiredltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtltstronggtadditional minimum qualificationsltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtthe knowledge skills and abilities typically acquired through the completion of a high school diploma andor gedltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtyears of relevant work experience ltstronggt yearsltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtphysical requirementsltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtmost of the time is spent sitting in a comfortable position and there is frequent opportunity to move about on rare occasions there may be a need to move or lift light articlesltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtpreferred qualificationsltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtdemonstrated a good working knowledge in at least one programming language interest in learning other programming languages as needed ability to work independently and in groups analytical thinking critical thinking strong problem solver attention to detail strong oral and written communication thorough understanding of data structures and algorithms knowledge of software design patternsltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtknowledge skills abilities and competenciesltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtour software engineers have the challenge and fun of taking on a wide variety of problems and directly affecting users and the businessltbrgtltbrgtthe following is a list of attributes found in successful quotecenter software engineersltbrgtltbrgtproblem solving work collaboratively with business stakeholders user experience designers and your fellow developers to create a solution build domain knowledge and understand the user ampamp business problems youre solvingltbrgtltbrgtquality deliverables good software architecture at quotecenter every developer is an architect you are responsible for creating systems that are appropriately maintainable scalable and extensibleltbrgtltbrgttaking ownership when a problem comes to your attention take care of it if youre too busy with something more important either assign it to someone else or set a reminder to come back to it laterltbrgtltbrgtalways learning be willing to learn whatever technologies tools or patterns necessary to solve a problem dont avoid a problem because someone else owns the code learn the code learn the domain solve the problemltbrgtltbrgtalways a mentor continually look for the chance to share your knowledge and skills with others even the most seasoned professional can learn new tricks from the most junior developer there is always something you know that someone else doesnt and vice versa so shareltbrgtltbrgteffective communication write and speak clearly and concisely be prepared to explain your work decisions and ideas to your colleagues graciously challenge ideas that dont seem right no matter where they originateltbrgtltbrgtgood teammate have a sense of humor build relationships with your colleagues work out differences with your colleagues directly go to your manager if youre unable to resolve it there actively work to disrupt backchannel and office politics look for ways to make the work environment better for everyone
